def_cn: （美国和加拿大部分地区的）市政委员会委员
def_en: In some parts of the United States and Canada, an alderman is a member of the governing body of a city.

def_cn: （1974年以前英格兰和威尔士的）高级市政官
def_en: Until 1974 in England and Wales, an alderman was a senior member of a local council who was elected by other councillors.
